descriptionHtml:
This is just something I made a long time ago, auto-aim is the one things I find truly annoying.

What this mod does: It makes the arrow move to where you aim, it does\'t hit an NPC\'s head anymore when you aim for his knee (that actually happened to me once).

Install: Extract the plugin from the archive and place it in your data folder. If you download this through NMM just activate it in your \"Mods\" tab.

Uninstall: Just do the opposite.

I hope you like it.
author: Werne
